name: Ring Servant
description: The Ring Servant is a large, imposing construct with notable physical strength, designed to serve its creator in combat. It features tough natural armor and operates primarily in melee.
memorable: Its ability to unleash a devastating area attack with its Ring of Destruction makes it a significant threat on the battlefield.
goals: To protect and assist its creator in combat situations.
relations: Typically encountered alongside its creator, as it serves as an ally.
environment: Often found in settings where its creator operates, such as magical workshops or battlefields.
strengths: Excels in melee combat with high Strength and durability, immune to many conditions and non-magical damage.
weaknesses: Limited intelligence and inability to communicate verbally.
attacks: Can perform two powerful slam attacks each turn, dealing significant bludgeoning damage and knocking opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: The Ring of Destruction allows the Ring Servant to deal massive force damage in an area, affecting multiple foes at once.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 14, enhancing its awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in athletics and perception, allowing it to excel in physical tasks and remain alert.
additional_information: Immunities to being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, and stunned ensure its reliability in battle.
Slam attacks are magical, allowing them to bypass certain resistances.
Immutable Form ability prevents alteration of its form from spells or effects.

durable creature with devastating area attacks
